00001 #include "ScriptManager.h"
00002 #include <lua.hpp>
00003 
00004 #include "../core/LogManager.h"
00005 using namespace jvgs::core;
00006 
00007 using namespace std;
00008 
00009 /* The compiler/linker needs to know we're dealing with c and not c++. */
00010 extern "C"
00011 {
00012     /* Header for the opening of the jvgs lua module. */
00013     extern int luaopen_jvgslua(lua_State *L);
00014 }
00015 
00016 namespace jvgs
00017 {
00018     namespace bind
00019     {
00020         ScriptManager::ScriptManager()
00021         {
00022             /* Create a new lua state. */
00023             luaState = lua_open();
00024 
00025             /* Open the standard libs and our own module. */
00026             luaL_openlibs(luaState);
00027             luaopen_jvgslua(luaState);
00028         }
00029 
00030         ScriptManager::~ScriptManager()
00031         {
00032             lua_close(luaState);
00033         }
00034 
00035         ScriptManager *ScriptManager::getInstance()
00036         {
00037             static ScriptManager instance;
00038             return &instance;
00039         }
00040 
00041         void ScriptManager::runScript(const string &fileName)
00042         {
00043             /* Load the file. */
00044             int result = luaL_dofile(luaState, fileName.c_str());
00045 
00046             /* An error occurred. */
00047             if(result)
00048                                 LogManager::getInstance()->error("%s: %s", fileName.c_str(),
00049                         lua_tostring(luaState, -1));
00050                         
00051         }
00052 
00053         void ScriptManager::runCode(const string &code)
00054         {
00055             /* Load the file. */
00056             int result = luaL_dostring(luaState, code.c_str());
00057 
00058             /* An error occurred. */
00059             if(result)
00060                                 LogManager::getInstance()->error("%s: %s", code.c_str(),
00061                         lua_tostring(luaState, -1));
00062         }
00063 
00064         void ScriptManager::setArguments(int argc, char *argv[])
00065         {
00066             for(int i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00067                 arguments.push_back(string(argv[i]));
00068         }
00069 
00070         int ScriptManager::getNumberOfArguments() const
00071         {
00072             return (int) arguments.size();
00073         }
00074 
00075         const string &ScriptManager::getArgument(int index) const
00076         {
00077             return arguments[index];
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
